source_objects.title: Pet Care & Training
source_objects.description: Learn the best kept secrets in pet care and pet training: dogs, cats, rabbits, horses, fish and many more.

items.headline: Learn how to run a successful dog training or dog related business, attract your ideal clients & charge high prices
objectives_summary: How to create an unforgettable brand.
How to choose the right niche or target market for you.
How to attract your target market and Ideal clients.

items.title: First Aid for Pets
items.headline: Be prepared for pet emergencies: build a first aid kit + learn what actions to take for a range of traumas and diseases.
objectives_summary: You'll learn how to identify and respond to different types of emergency scenarios; how to safely handle your pet when they are injured; and how to build your very own pet first aid kit
By the end of the course, you'll have the confidence to know how to best help your pet in case of an emergency

items.title: Dog Training for Humans -Easy Peasy Recall Training for Dogs
items.headline: How to quickly and easily teach your dog a fool proof recall in just 7 days.
objectives_summary: Confidently and successfully call your dog back to you in the park, EVEN when he is distracted.
Allow your dog more off leash exercise and freedom and enjoy worry free exercise with a dog who wants to be with YOU.

items.title: Walk Yourself Wealthy - The Dog Walker Business Course
items.headline: How to launch and grow a profitable dog walking business
objectives_summary: After this course students will know the marketing strategies needed to make their dog walking business a success

items.title: Holistic Dog - Treating K9 Pain, Stress & Ailments Naturally
items.headline: Learn how  Acupuncture, Acupressure, Reiki. Herbs & Homeopathy, Nutrition, Aromatherapy & Crystals can help your dog.
objectives_summary: You will learn how veterinary acupuncture, animal acupressure, animal reiki, laser and chiropractic medicine can help your dog.
You will learn about herbal, homeopathic remedies and supplements used for dogs with pain.
Learn about natural remedies for canine arthritis and hip dysplasia.

items.title: Dog Training For Humans - How to Play with Your Dog
items.headline: Discover how to use play so you can have better control, more fun and less stress with your pet dog
objectives_summary: Develop a great relationship with your dog so you can easily train him to do what

items.headline: How to Transition Your Dog & Cat Onto Raw Feeding The Safe & Easy Way and Why They Need More Than BARF!
objectives_summary: Advance your Natural Dog Whispering skills so you can form a better bond with your companion animal.

Improve your knowledge about where domesticated animals have come from and what the main problems they face in society today so you can be better equipped to help them lead longer happier lives in your care.
Grasp why it is important to feed domesticated animals their species appropriate diet so their overall health and well-being is being cared for in the best possible way.

items.headline: Training your puppy for home is not hard once you know how. This dog training course will make your puppy a housemate.
objectives_summary: Learn how to use clicker training to teach your dog the following useful behaviors:
Eye contact, name response
Sit, Down, and Stay
